segments.text: I feel so sad watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so distracted, she doesn't even notice the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so quiet, trying not to draw any attention to themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for the cookie jar, but the stool he's standing on is so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the sadness in the girl's eyes as she waits for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, making everything wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so helpless, like I want to step in and help but I can't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the sadness in the children's eyes, they just want a simple treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice what's happening and help them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just so heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
